fields.description:
Resource name should be bold in dialog text.

This was correct on initial work, something got messed up in rebrand CSS changes that affected this dialog.
fields.summary: Confirmation dialogs don't apply bold styles to resources in Chrome

comments.body: [~jloza], let's talk about this in context of GUI-2538.
should be good to go in GUI-2537b branch.
General issue still present, kicking back to fix that sitewide. Updated issue title and description.

[~jloza]: This appears to be limited to the new delete alarm confirmation dialogs, as those don't have resource names surrounded by tags... {code}
{{ alarm.name }}
{{ key }} = {{ val }}
{code} I've checked numerous confirmation dialogs elsewhere (e.g. delete volume dialog) and they seem fine. Will update the title of this ticket since it isn't QA-able as it stands now.

[~kgill], it's not limited to those. It's on all the modal confirmation dialogs throughout the app. Attaching screenshot from Master showing the problem, please fix problem and issue title and description.
[~jloza]: Just saw your note... will investigate

[~jloza]: Could you provide more info on the detach volume dialog?  Browser, what page you launched it from?  The resources are bold in the detach volume dialog when launched on the volumes landing page and volume details page (screenshot attached).  I tested on Safari... will check other browsers.

This issue appears to only affect Chrome... Safari and Firefox don't experience this problem. 

With the HPE rebranding effort, we moved to a Metric-SemiBold font that doesn't seem to be recognized by Chrome for those tags.

Fixed in https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/1909
[~kgill] title and summary need to be changed back to reflect global issue please or QA won't know how to QA this.
there was no problem with the delete alarm dialogs.

Yay, looks good now, thanks [~kgill]! 

UX review passed, ready for code review.
[~jloza]: BTW, we should probably remove the "Remove alarm from instance" dialog screenshot since that dialog had been re-worked, and we don't want to confuse QA here, right?

[~jloza]: I suggested we delete the "Remove alarm from instance" screenshot since that confused me as to the nature/description of this ticket (where I thought we should bold alarm resources/dimensions) and would likely confuse QA since that dialog has changed per GUI-2538.  I would delete it but I don't have the permission -- probably since I didn't upload the screenshot.
Verified that the volume and instance values are in bold in the dialog for both chrome and FF under windows 7.
